content.question: Which of the following was most directly a reaction against the Western European social values highlighted in Source 2 ?

choices.label: The policy of greater media freedom in the Soviet Union known as glasnost
The contraction of educational opportunities for women
Reforms in the Catholic Church by the Second Vatican Council

topic.text: 9.14: 20th- and 21st-Century Culture, Arts, and Demographic Trends

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
